traits.Aggressive: As a bonus action, the ogre can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
